Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.description: Explore my latest web development projects showcasing modern technologies and best practices

descriptions.talentbridge: Developed a comprehensive web application for identifying twice-exceptional students (gifted with learning challenges). Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, featuring bilingual support (English/Arabic) with full RTL layout. Implemented evidence-based assessment forms for teachers and parents, instant scoring system, and PDF report generation. Key features include dark/light theme switching, responsive design across all devices, and professional UI with smooth animations. Achieved 90+ Lighthouse performance score with optimized code splitting and image delivery.
descriptions.flyKitchen: Developed a modern, fully responsive Next.js web app for Fly Kitchen, a cloud kitchen platform. Implemented advanced UI/UX with animated hero, interactive product journeys, and dynamic feature showcases. Integrated multi-language support (Arabic/English), RTL layouts, and custom sliders for brands and channels. Focused on performance, accessibility, and seamless user experience across all devices.
descriptions.marketio: Marketio is a responsive e-commerce app built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring product search, categories, wishlist, color variants, and dynamic ratings. It includes Firebase authentication (email/Google), Stripe payments with a success page, and multi-language support (English, Arabic, Spanish) via i18n. Enhanced with light/dark modes, Swiper sliders, and React Router DOM, it's optimized for all devices. Deployed on Vercel, it showcases my skills in creating feature-rich, user-friendly stores.
descriptions.melco: Melco is a responsive, bilingual website for a leading safety equipment provider. Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and next-intl, it supports English/Arabic with RTL compatibility. Features include a full-screen cover image, SEO optimization, dark mode, and sections for Vision, Mission, and Values (Quality, Innovation, Professionalism, Partnership, Sustainability). Scalable for future enhancements like e-commerce.
descriptions.goldenMetal: Golden Metal is a responsive, SEO-friendly website built for a Saudi Arabian mining company to showcase their services and expertise. The site features a modern, multi-language interface (English/Arabic) with RTL support, ensuring accessibility for diverse audiences. It includes service pages with smooth animations, a contact form powered by EmailJS, and an optimized structure for fast load times. Deployed on Hostinger, the project highlights my skills in creating professional, client-focused web solutions with a focus on performance and user engagement.
descriptions.marsEsim: Mars - eSIM is a React-based web app for seamless eSIM connectivity, enabling travelers and remote workers to browse and activate local, regional, and global data plans. It features a multi-language UI (English/Arabic) with RTL support, a searchable country list, detailed plan info, and an interactive FAQ. With smooth animations and a responsive grid layout, it's optimized for all devices. Deployed on Vercel, it showcases scalable, user-friendly front-end solutions.
